OOC: Stay out of my business. What is your business here, Rauq? You're the =
head moderator? I've been here longer than you have, and have contributed f=
ar more only to be put down time after time. You're a rookie compared to me=
, too, Rauq. If you smell what the Rauq is cooking.

It's not my fault Card=
head is such a bad RPer, is it?...

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: =
x_rauq_x
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 10:42=
 PM
  Subject: ooC: people...


  I've been lurking around for those wonder=
ing. Megatron is waiting in 
  the control room for the Predacons, most of =
which are 'busy' or 
  something. I really don't have much to post about ri=
ght now, but I 
  still have to read the posts up till when i last checked =
em.

  I guess i have to stick my nose in, cause this obviously aint 
  get=
ting better, it's getting worse. *raises verbal shields*

  First think tha=
t needs to happen is a cease fire in this flame war 
  between cardhead, lu=
rker, and narrator. it started wrong right from 
  the start. certain thing=
s which shouldn't have been said, were said, 
  and the replies were less t=
han sucessful at defusing the situation 
  and it blew up. 

  cardhead, if=
 you don't like Narrator's posting style, that's your 
  problem. Telling h=
im that you don't like it, with a bunch of 
  senseless slander isn't going=
 to make him post the way you'd like 
  him to post.

  Narrator, keep ooc =
comments out of your posting, if you want to say 
  something, say it and n=
o pot shots. And I find it really hard to 
  believe that you managed to pu=
t 'piece of dog shit' and 'grow up' in 
  the same context.

  If anyone wa=
nts to grow up, then they should shut up about this 
  stupid arguement, an=
d get back to role playing. Nothing anyone can 
  say now short of an appol=
ogies and 'I'm being quiet', can show me 
  that anyone is growing up.

  *=
preps for backlash*

  --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...>=
 wrote:
  > BULL-FUCKING-SHIT YOU HAVE.  I'm 20 - I've been into Transforme=
rs 
  as 
  > long as anyone else who would have even the remotest interest=
 in 
  this 
  > RPG.
  >

somewhere painful.  
  I've 
  > been roleplaying my WHOLE DAMN LIFE.
  > 
=

  >

u, you piece of dog shit. You can kiss my ass and

pers...
